sentence.Network_en: They are already battling to eradicate illnesses such as malaria and tetanus.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经在努力消灭疟疾、破伤风等疾病。

sentence.Network_en: These insects are very difficult to eradicate.
It'set out to eradicate heresy, and ended by perpetuating it.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的目的只是要根除异端邪说, 结果却巩固了异端邪说.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'pull up by the roots'): from Latin eradicat- 'torn up by the roots', from the verb eradicare, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + radix, radic- 'root'

entry.def: To eradicate something means to get rid of it completely.

example.ex: They are already battling to eradicate illnesses such as malaria and tetanus...
example.tran: 他们已经在努力消灭疟疾、破伤风等疾病。

example.ex: If tedious tasks could be eradicated, the world would be a much better place.
example.tran: 如果可以消灭那些单调乏味的工作，世界将会变得更加美好。

sentences.sentence: "the plague wiped out an entire population"

means.word_mean: 2. destroy completely, as if down to the roots;

sentences.sentence: "the vestiges of political democracy were soon uprooted"

auth_sentence.content: Grant, began a determined policy to eradicate polygamy altogether.
auth_sentence.res_content: Grant, began a determined policy to eradicate polygamy altogether.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grant, began a determined policy to eradicate polygamy altogether.

auth_sentence.content: I hope that they can quickly eradicate such an invasive species.
auth_sentence.res_content: I hope that they can quickly eradicate such an invasive species.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hope that they can quickly eradicate such an invasive species.

auth_sentence.content: That will liberate enough cereals and plant proteins to totally eradicate starvation.
auth_sentence.res_content: That will liberate enough cereals and plant proteins to totally eradicate starvation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That will liberate enough cereals and plant proteins to totally eradicate starvation.

stems_affixes.word_buile: e出,出来+labor劳动+ate做→劳动出来→精做的
e出,出来+long长+ate表动词或形容词→长出来
e出,出来+long长+ate表动词或形容词→长出来
e出,出来+merge=merg沉没,淹没→淹没的东西出现→浮现
e出,出来+radic根+ate做→把根挖出→根除
e出,出来+valuate对……评价→出价值→评价
e出+radic根+able能……的→能把根挖出的
e出+radic根+ate表动词→把根挖出→根除

Sentence.sentence: It is eradicating the tough aspects of management.

A study by Mannaz, a leadership development company, suggests that, while the bully-boy chief executive of old may not have been eradicated completely, there is a definite shift in emphasis towards less tough styles of management – at least in America and Europe.

means.word_mean: 摧毁,完全根除,消灭,杜绝

sentences.en: a crusading zeal to eradicate drug abuse
sentences.cn: 彻底打击滥用药物的激情

sentences.en: These insects are very difficult to eradicate.
The disease has been eradicated from the world.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病已在全世界得到根除。
